Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class MarbleTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.MarbleTest
public class MarbleTest
extends java.lang.Object
This class tests the classes that implements the Marble interface

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MarbleTest()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void discardedTest()
    For each color(purple, yellow, grey, blue) this method tests the different cases when the resource can't be stored so it needs to be discarded (all deposits are full and there is no special deposits available, no swap possibilities for the deposit that already contains the selected resource, the selected resource is already in another deposit but it is full).
    void invalidActionTest()
    For each color (purple, yellow, grey, blue) this method tests the different cases when the action is invalid (the selected resource is already stored in a different deposit and there is still space available, the selected deposit is full but there is a special deposit available, the selected deposit is wrong and there is an empty deposit, the selected special deposit is of a different resource/is not present, the deposit is full but it can be swapped to have more space).
    void okActionTest()
    For each color (purple, yellow, grey, blue) this method tests the different cases when an action can be performed correctly (big/mid/small/special deposit that already contains the corresponding type of resource but there is still space and empty deposits without duplicates).
    void redActionTest()
    This method tests the RedMarble action() method.
    void whiteLeaderTest()
    This method tests the WhiteMarble action() method when there is an active leader of this kind and the action can be done/the resource is discarded/the action is invalid.
    void whiteNoLeaderTest()
    This method tests the WhiteMarble action() method when there is no active leader of this kind
    void whiteTwoLeaderTest()
    This method tests the WhiteMarble action() method when there are two active leader of this kind and the player has selected how to transform the WhiteMarble.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MarbleTest

      public MarbleTest()

  • Method Details

    • okActionTest

      @Test public void okActionTest()
      For each color (purple, yellow, grey, blue) this method tests the different cases when an action can be performed correctly (big/mid/small/special deposit that already contains the corresponding type of resource but there is still space and empty deposits without duplicates).

    • discardedTest

      @Test public void discardedTest()
      For each color(purple, yellow, grey, blue) this method tests the different cases when the resource can't be stored so it needs to be discarded (all deposits are full and there is no special deposits available, no swap possibilities for the deposit that already contains the selected resource, the selected resource is already in another deposit but it is full).

    • invalidActionTest

      @Test public void invalidActionTest()
      For each color (purple, yellow, grey, blue) this method tests the different cases when the action is invalid (the selected resource is already stored in a different deposit and there is still space available, the selected deposit is full but there is a special deposit available, the selected deposit is wrong and there is an empty deposit, the selected special deposit is of a different resource/is not present, the deposit is full but it can be swapped to have more space).

    • whiteNoLeaderTest

      @Test public void whiteNoLeaderTest()
      This method tests the WhiteMarble action() method when there is no active leader of this kind

    • whiteLeaderTest

      @Test public void whiteLeaderTest()
      This method tests the WhiteMarble action() method when there is an active leader of this kind and the action can be done/the resource is discarded/the action is invalid.

    • whiteTwoLeaderTest

      @Test public void whiteTwoLeaderTest()
      This method tests the WhiteMarble action() method when there are two active leader of this kind and the player has selected how to transform the WhiteMarble. It tests when is selected the first leader, the second leader, and when an exception is thrown because the selected color is wrong.

    • redActionTest

      @Test public void redActionTest()
      This method tests the RedMarble action() method. It checks if the position of the FaithMarker is correctly increased by the method.
